      • getBaseHostUrl

        public String getBaseHostUrl()

      • buildUponBaseHostUrl

        public Uri.Builder buildUponBaseHostUrl(String... paths)
        Builds upon the base host url by appending paths to the url.
        Parameters:
        paths - the paths to append
        Returns:
        Uri.Builder that can be used to further build the url.

      • buildUserAgent

        public static String buildUserAgent(String clientName,
                                    String version)
        Returns:
        User-Agent string that looks like: client_name/client_version (client_version_code) model/os_version (manufacturer;device;brand;product;client_source;preload;on_wifi)

        Example: TwitterAndroidSDK/1.1.0.dev HTC One/4.1.2 (HTC;HTC One;tmous;m7)

        See go/ooua for more information.
